# mypkg_Arul

<!-- badges: start -->

The goal of mypkg is to learn github functioning

## Installation

You can install the latest version of `mypkg_Arul` from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("mypkg")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/arulmanit/mypkg_arul) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("arulmanit/mypkg_arul")
```
